EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-Public Sector-Email-eDM invite to FIC-T001O4.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Learn how SDN can protect your network and automatically respond
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> DISCOVER OUR LATEST CYBER-SECURITY INNOVATIONS Network security systems are playing an increasingly significant role in protecting against emerging and complex cyber threats such as quantum computing. This is particularly critical as industries and government are raising their attack-surface with the digital transformation of their services.
At the FIC (23-24 January 2018, Lille, France) Nokia will showcase its latest innovations to protect mission and business-critical networks:
- A live demonstration of the industry’s only quantum-safe, certified optical and microwave transmission solution.
- Industry’s first distributed, end-to-end (cloud, datacenter, branch) software-defined network security, visibility and security automation solution.
- Our network based solution to protect connected objects and secure massive deployment of new internet of things (IoT) based services.
Come and join us on our booth #D17.
Register HERE <[[https://www.forum-fic.com/site/GB/Visit/Free_Badge,C60118,I60118.htm]]> to get your free pass: Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
